Package com.versant.util

Interface Summary
CppHashMapIterator An Iterator for CppHashMaps
CppListIterator An Iterator for CppLists that allows you to traverse the CppList in either direction and modify the list during iteration.
VStatsNames The VStatsName interface contains all of the symbolic constants used in the VERSANT statistics package, including statistics names and various flags.
 

Class Summary
ActiveDatabaseInfo ActiveDatabaseInfo -- For a description of an active database
BEProfile BEProfile provides setters and getters to read and modify the back end profile of a particular database.
CompareDBResult CompareDBResult -- For return values of comparedb
CppHashMap This is a Second Class Object to be used only as an attribute in a persistent instance of a C++ defined class when you share objects and classes created from the VERSANT C++ language interface with the transparent Java binding.
CppHashSet This is a Second Class Object used only as an attribute in a persistent instance of a C++ defined class when you share objects and classes created from the VERSANT C++ language interface with the transparent Java binding.
CppList This is a Second Class Object to be used only as an attribute in a persistent instance of a C++ defined class when you want to share objects and classes created from the VERSANT C++ language interface with the transparent Java binding.
DateTimeConvert Contains static utility functions for converting between VERSANT time and date formats (o_date, o_time, and o_timestamp) to Java time and date objects java.util.Date, java.sql.Date, java.sql.Time, and java.sql.Timestamp).
DBCompareResult DBCompareResult -- For return values of compareDBs
DBConnectInfo Gets parameters and returns values in method getActivityInfoOn() in class VStatistics.
DBEnvInfo The DBEnvInfo class methods provide information about the VERSANT environment.
DBListInfo The DBListInfo class methods provide information about the database.
DBLockInfo Gets parameters and returns values in method getActivityInfoOn() in class VStatistics.
DBTransactionInfo Gets parameters and returns values in method getActivityInfoOn() in class VStatistics.
DBUserInfo The DBUserInfo class methods provide information about the user.
DBUtility DBUtility provides the same functionality as provided by VERSANT utility functions.The functionality this class provides includes the ability to programmatically make, create, stop, start, remove, copy, reorganize databases.
DVector The com.versant.util.DVector class implements a java.util.
FEProfile FEProfile provides setters and getters to read and modify the front end profile of a particular database.
FTSStatus FTSStatus -- For a status of the FTS database as a whole.
LargeVector This class is a disk-based, persistent vector, and it supports the same methods as java.util.Vector.
SessionPool A SessionPool manages a pool of sessions.
VHashtable VHashtable is the persistent version of java.util.Hashtable (JDK 1.1) and supports the same methods.
VStatistics This class provides methods to allow you to collect statistics in order to measure, analyze and improve application performance.
VVector VVector is the persistent version of java.util.Vector (JDK 1.1) and supports the same methods.
